definition: to discuss/to comment/to criticize/to judge/to choose (by public appraisal)
flat/level/equal/to tie (make the same score)/to draw (score)/calm/peaceful/see also 平聲|平声[ping2 sheng1]
to select on the basis of a vote or consensus
evaluation committee/judging panel/judging panel member/adjudicator/abbr. for 評選委員會委員|评选委员会委员[ping2 xuan3 wei3 yuan2 hui4 wei3 yuan2]
to elect as/to choose as/to consider as

sentences.english: Public toilets will be rated from one to five stars.
sentences.chinese: 公廁評定將從一星級一直到五星級。

sentences.english: The minimum allowable values of the energy efficiency and. Energy …
sentences.chinese: 房間空調器機能效限定值與節能評價值。

sentences.english: "Look at him wrinkle his brow... nothing needs to be said... sexy...", ran one comment on the Tianyu site.
sentences.chinese: 在天宇網站的一個評論說。

sentences.english: It said the vocational training plan should be implemented sooner and enterprises should be encouraged to offer skill training for its employees.
sentences.chinese: 評論說，職業培訓應進早引進給求職者提供技能培訓。

sentences.english: 'If you want to leave, just leave!' said another.
sentences.chinese: 另外一則評論說，如果你想走就走好了。

sentences.english: The content of amylose and protein is significantly negative correlation with it.
sentences.chinese: 直鏈澱粉和蛋白質含量與綜合評價值呈負相關。

sentences.english: Other ministers even remarked that Tin Aung Myint Oo had usurped Thein Sein’s power.
sentences.chinese: 其他部長甚至評論說丁昂敏吳篡奪了吳的權力。

sentences.english: She recently commented that unhappy childhoods seem to produce fiction writers.
sentences.chinese: 最近她評論說，似乎悲慘的童年能夠造就作家。

sentences.english: The commentary says, the US must make sure that Russia is appeased .
sentences.chinese: 評論說，美國必須保證俄羅斯被滿足。

sentences.english: Any plans you write are not taken into account when an assessment is made of your work.
sentences.chinese: 作文評分時不會考慮考生的寫作提綱。

sentences.english: Finally, using the linear weighted method, the value evaluating the credit state of high-tech enterprise is obtained.
sentences.chinese: 最後，運用線性加權法獲得高技術企業的信用評價值。

sentences.english: The lowest price method shall apply to projects of normatively ordered commodities and general services.
sentences.chinese: 最低評標價法適用於標準定製商品及通用服務項目。

sentences.english: Eg. Don't worry about the reviewers. You're in good hands.
sentences.chinese: 別擔心評審會怎麼評，你的狀況很好。

sentences.english: The overall survival curves of the 2 cohorts were superimposable, the researchers commented.
sentences.chinese: 研究者評論說，兩組患者總的生存曲線重疊。

sentences.english: All the conferences had greatly advanced the development of liquor production and liquor-making techniques.
sentences.chinese: 歷屆評酒會都推動了白酒生產和技術的發展。

sentences.english: The teachers failed me on the written composition.
sentences.chinese: 教師們評我的筆頭作文不及格。

definition: to select on the basis of a vote or consensus
to calculate/to compute/to count/to regard as important/to plan/ruse/meter/gauge
to inform/to report/to make known/report/speech/talk/lecture/CL:篇[pian1],份[fen4],個|个[ge4],通[tong4]
to look at/to watch/to observe/to behold/to advise/concept/point of view/outlook
to count/to count as/to regard as/to enumerate (sb's shortcomings)
